ALL_OPTIONS_COMMENT: All config options not suffixed with '_COMMENT' must be in the final config.json
available on the static directory serving this UI. Optional configuration parameters
can simply be set to an empty string or null. This file provides default values that
the dockerized version of the static site will use when the value is not passed as
an environmental variable. The dockerized site will also strip all _COMMENT suffixed
FILTER_TO_CURRENT_USER_COMMENT: (required bool), filter the cluster list to the logged-in user.
DEPLOY_ENVIRONMENT_COMMENT: (required enum: local, prod) use mock APIs when set to 'local'.
DEFAULT_PROJECT_COMMENT: (optional) a default project to be populated in the cluster creation form.
DISABLE_PROJECT_ENTRY_COMMENT: (required bool), if true, disable project entry for users.
STARTUP_SCRIPT_URI_COMMENT: (optional) 'gs://' path to a cluster init script. If present, this will be provided as the jupyterUserScriptUri param
EXTRA_GOOGLE_SCOPES_COMMENT: (optional) space separated list of google scopes to request in addition to email and profile
